# Inline chuncks

```{r echo=FALSE}
iris <- iris[, 1:3]
```

In the data set `iris` contains records for `r ncol(iris)` variables.

```{r message=FALSE}
library(taxlist)
summary(Easplist, "papyrus")
```

The scientific name of papyrus is `r print_name(Easplist, 206)`.
